message.content:
cs.CV, cs.GR, cs.MM, cs.LG, cs.AI. 

The paper deals with tasks related to computer vision and graphics, such as human motion imitation, appearance transfer, and novel view synthesis. The proposed method involves using a 3D body mesh recovery module and a Liquid Warping GAN with Liquid Warping Block (LWB) to preserve source information and synthesize images. These tasks and techniques are commonly studied in the computer vision (cs.CV) and graphics (cs.GR) communities. Additionally, the use of a denoising convolutional auto-encoder suggests a machine learning (cs.LG) component to the work. Finally, the paper involves generating new images, which is a common theme in artificial intelligence (cs.AI) research.
